unnormalised: Campus hiring remains a crucial recruitment strategy for organizations across India. IIM Ahmedabad consistently provides top-tier talent.
normalised: Campus hiring remains a crucial recruitment strategy for organizations across India. I I M Ahmedabad consistently provides top-tier talent. Recruiters should focus on showcasing growth opportunities, mirroring the ambition seen in films like "Rocket Boys." Competitive packages, above even rupee fifteen lakh per annum, are essential to attract candidates. Consider expanding recruitment efforts beyond Tier one institutions to tap into diverse skill sets from places like Nagpur. A structured internship program of around six months, even at a remote location one hundred kilometer away, is beneficial. Early engagement events in February are highly recommended. Ensure H R representatives are culturally sensitive during interactions. Streamlining the interview process improves candidate experience.
